name: GraphQL
comment:
This library provides support functions used by
    [elm-graphql](https://github.com/jahewson/elm-graphql), the GraphQL code generator for Elm.

# Helper functions
@docs query, mutation, apply, maybeEncode

values.name: apply
values.type: Json.Decode.Decoder (a -> b) -> Json.Decode.Decoder a -> Json.Decode.Decoder b

values.name: maybeEncode
values.comment: Encodes a `Maybe` as JSON, using `null` for `Nothing`.

values.name: mutation
values.type: String -> String -> String -> Json.Encode.Value -> Json.Decode.Decoder a -> Task.Task Http.Error a

values.name: query
values.type: String -> String -> String -> String -> Json.Encode.Value -> Json.Decode.Decoder a -> Task.Task Http.Error a
